description.raw:
I'm preparing some slides and noticed a couple of includes across libraries which don't make sense anymore, so I removed them. I also removed class `gui::ModelBuilderWidget` which had `physics` includes. The class was not being used or even built / installed, so I didn't add the removal to the migration guide.

This is how the library dependencies are now:

# physics

* sensors
* SDF
* math
* transport
* common
* util

# sensors

* physics
* rendering
* SDF
* math
* transport
* common
* util (only system.hh)

# rendering

* SDF
* math
* transport
* common
* util (only system.hh)

# gui

* rendering
* SDF
* math
* transport
* common
* util (only system.hh - LogRecord only for test)

# util 

* SDF
* math
* transport
* common

# common

* physics
* sensors
* rendering
* SDF
* math
* util (only system.hh)
description.html:
I'm preparing some slides and noticed a couple of includes across libraries which don't make sense anymore, so I removed them. I also removed class gui::ModelBuilderWidget which had physics includes. The class was not being used or even built / installed, so I didn't add the removal to the migration guide.

This is how the library dependencies are now:

physics

  • sensors
  • SDF
  • math
  • transport
  • common
  • util

sensors

  • physics
  • rendering
  • SDF
  • math
  • transport
  • common
  • util (only system.hh)

rendering

  • SDF
  • math
  • transport
  • common
  • util (only system.hh)

gui

  • rendering
  • SDF
  • math
  • transport
  • common
  • util (only system.hh - LogRecord only for test)

util

  • SDF
  • math
  • transport
  • common

common

  • physics
  • sensors
  • rendering
  • SDF
  • math
  • util (only system.hh)
